attributes.action: Against Ebay New feedback Policy for Sellers (sellers cant leave negative)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please Sign this petition against Ebay new feedback policy. according to new rules introduced from May 2008 sellers will no longer be able to leave negative feedbacks to buyers, and this include 1st time buyers who doesnt even know the ebay policies.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
